product_description: Vienna is a full grain  Semi Aniline leather GreenTag certified
recyclable_offcuts_description: The off-cut are and can be used for leathercraft
water_reduction_techniques: Tannery has its own watewater treatment plant
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: All Raw material (hides) are sourced within 500 km of the tannery in Bavaria and Northern Austria. These are transported by Road freight to the tannery.
minimisation_design_strategy: To minimise offcuts and wastage with any leather it is recommendedto have accurate measurements and cutting methods, and  patterns to maximise leather usage. Using a professional upholsterer who understands the characteristics and performance of the leather and can provide an accurate material requirement. The Pelle Leathers team can assist with cutting yield for your project.
factory_finished_description: Full grain Semi Aniline upholstery leather.  It is evenly coloured and protected for high light fastness and durability.
